sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A drone has crashed in western Moscow after Russian air defence systems intercepted it, Moscow's mayor has said.

sentences.sentence: According to Sergei Sobyanin, no one was injured.

sentences.sentence: It is happening close to us. Конечно, страх есть. У меня трое детей. Конечно, я беспокоюсь. Это уже в непосредственном близи от нас происходит.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Но если вы меня спросите, что делать, я не знаю.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Наверное, нужно как-то усиливать безопасность.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: На мой взгляд, это уже такие серьезные какие-то знаки для того, чтобы задуматься.

sentences.sentence: The Home Office spokesperson has said that no individuals on board have presented with symptoms of Legionnaires' disease and that there is no direct risk for the wider community. In southwestern Hungary, the Drava and Mura rivers are breaking records.

sentences.sentence: At the confluence of the two rivers at Ertylosh, water levels were 17 centimetres higher than previous records set in 1972. We expect a very long and very slow-growing flood.

sentences.sentence: Sipos Egyi Zoltán, Euronews, Drávaszabolcs. political leaders gave the green light to a military response to Niger's coup on Thursday. The coup's leaders had ignored a deadline set by ECOWAS to restore the president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Its military chiefs are reportedly to meet in Ghana this weekend to weigh up the best options. France and the United States have both endorsed the bloc's actions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: ECOWAS, the organization that brings together West African countries, is playing a lead role in making clear the imperative of the return to constitutional order, and we very much support ECOAS's leadership and work on this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But outwardly at least, people in Niamey, Niger's capital, appear to support the coup which happened on July 26th. The United Nations has said it's concerned about the welfare of President Mohamed Bazoum, who's been under house arrest since he was deposed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The coup's leaders have warned they'll execute him if they're attacked.
